title: Communication font
content:
Hi everyone,

I'm putting together a directory and need some crisp, clean and modern images for Telephone, Fax, Email and Mobile. I've looked at various wingdings/webdings as well as ZapfEssentials, but none of them really work well.

Does anyone have any font suggestions or failing that I could use vector images and paste them in (I'm using InDesign).

Thanks for your help.
author: decoderltd

comments.content: Thanks Stephen, FF Netto has done the job nicely.
Coll, Mark. Would love to see what you've done with it.
